## `no empty character class in regular expression`

### `0`

```

 unknown:1:15 lint/js/noEmptyCharacterClass ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

  ✖ Do not use empty character classes in regular expressions.

    let foo = /^abc[]/;foo;
                   ^

  ℹ Empty character classes are usually typos.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
```
